testcase.classname: Validating Login functionality for Amazon site
testcase.name: User can able to login with valide credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user in "https://www.amazon.in/" page.................................passed When user click on sign in button it shoud display Amazon signin page.......passed And user enter mail id then click on continue button........................passed And user enter password then click on Login button..........................passed Then user should be in home page............................................passed
